display_long_description:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

[media]

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

[media]

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

[media]

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

[media]

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is. 

[media]

**Talk to the Devs and join our community on Discord**:  https://discord.gg/cK4aG9sp8f
display_long_description_unprocessed:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499618274_651211461159970_363128261145746290_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=l5IJ8iXXicgQ7kNvwE_tQpJ&_nc_oc=AdkThBtLfHoQv0JPE2KPRMGXdKRUOD6WdTnCiAf5GHEHM2oauCqJSAux_CncBqt-zug&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3IApU_cY1LpaEj88a2em1g&oh=00_Afs7Nc_tytJPqj56NYvTgsDCbpBT-Vajko6ebOAbCDNJIg&oe=698EE356)

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491828038_841072975026277_681659773377307198_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=WuRfaC0xvWEQ7kNvwFQxhrb&_nc_oc=AdlCCd_mmVKkW2qX3ZSmz3NVC3Q6cC141roxFPLPGEf1dKJr9GIcjAGESAD-kNXG_ss&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3IApU_cY1LpaEj88a2em1g&oh=00_AfuyPIt9CJ5WmMxEVt1RJDfkM4hkoxTpa-fBi_GQMFH5Fw&oe=698EE405)

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491825050_1360261182487425_1701726842792685932_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=5wijhtYeeBUQ7kNvwEKAvli&_nc_oc=AdmpGdi-6IV6zuvNVn1k5HQi8LH7rSHj82cp_QXGE46kJKhggZ-taYMNANwUZwnm1sU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3IApU_cY1LpaEj88a2em1g&oh=00_AfvIE6qp5WSb8rt-OmQalFHuMEOyBj-DgY3pvE0eehyOzA&oe=698EEE31)

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499303585_2027694071311803_6829180901132345132_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=_8KgcKE9COUQ7kNvwEBoTQP&_nc_oc=Adn7qaRNqUMMuiXnfYqRrrBMgHR9gcmLwQKMi1FqDbyRYNTZ95-DE7pLiI9i1gQOiWk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=3IApU_cY1LpaEj88a2em1g&oh=00_AfvReswVPxqnHB-2G3arLuhynR8qbCrz_zYeYnuOr2JsBg&oe=698ED963)

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is.
